subject: Re: Suite setup not always run from Eclipse

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <saff@...> wrote=
:
>
> Currently, I don't think there's a default way to do this.  There's
>=
 probably two steps to get there:
> 
> 1) Create a feature enhancement requ=
est for JUnit to allow a test
> class to link back to the suite in whose co=
ntext it must run.
> 
> 2) Create a feature enhancement request for Eclipse=
 to honor such a
link.
> 
> In the meantime, I fear you're stuck with some =
sort of lazily set-up
> solution, with a @BeforeClass on the individual tes=
t class that runs
> the suite's BeforeClass code if it hasn't already been =
run.
> 
> Or, a custom Runner that does the same...
